name: Match3
setup: Match-3 puzzle board where tiles are swapped to create matches that clear and score points.
goal: Maximize score over a sequence of moves by creating high-value matches.

agents.description: Each agent instance plays on its own board using the same policy.

terms: Larger reward for clearing special tiles created by longer matches.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Custom Match-3 sensor encodes the board as a vector or visual representation.
behavior_parameters.actions: Custom actuator chooses which tiles to swap.
behavior_parameters.visual_observations: Can be encoded visually or purely as a vector state.
